text:
@realDonaldTrump Did you actually go down into the @WhiteHouse bunker?

Take away peoples justice #georgesfloyd 
and jobs #COVID19 
and #healthcare 
and #Foodstamps 

Then order the @NationalGuard to shot them if they protest.

#TurdReich #dictatorship
#TrumpOwnsEveryDeath 
#TrumpHasNoPlan
